text:
e="preserve">Lance Allen Carson (December 3, 1945 – October 14, 2020) was an American Republican politician. He was a member of the South Dakota House of Representatives representing District 20 from 2007 to 2015 and 2017 to 2019. Carson was born in Nunda, South Dakota.
Carson died of COVID-19 on October 14, 2020 in Pierre, South Dakota at age 74.
